item.title: 28th Austrian National Council: Prior Experiences as MPs.
item.dc:creator: Roland Schmidt
item.description: Who speaks for how long in the National Council of Austria’s Parliament? And who respects the relevant time limits?

item.title: Calls to Order in Austria’s Parliament
item.dc:creator: Roland Schmidt
item.description: Whenever a speaker in the National Council uses e.g. foul language and violates the ‘dignity of the house’, the president of the National Council is tasked with issuing a ‘Call to Order’. To whom are these calls directed, and how frequently do they occur? Using the development version of the new R Package {ParlAT} helps answering these questions.
